titleStmt.title: A compendyous treatyse of sclau[n]dre declarynge what sclaundre is, and what it sygnifyeth, and how many kyndes of sclaundre there be.

publicationStmt.publisher: In the Old bayly in saynt Sepulchres parysshe, by me Rychard Lant,

notesStmt.note: Imprint from colophon; publication date suggested by STC.
Reproduction of the original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
